entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Puvirnituq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:45 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -31.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Puvirnituq Airport 02:29 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

Temperature: -31.6°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 71 %

Dewpoint: -35.1°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 52 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Temperature rising to minus 28 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 28 by morning. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023
